abstract: Grand jury in Georgia indicts jail employees Maxine Evans, Jason Kenny and Gregory Brown in death of Mathew Ajibade, 21-year-old college student whose remains were found in isolation cell in county jail in Savannah, Ga.
lead_paragraph: A grand jury has indicted three people in the death of a 21-year-old college student whose body was found in restraints at a county jail in Savannah, Ga.

headline.main: Georgia: 3 Indicted in Killing of Student at Jail
headline.print_headline: Georgia: 3 Indicted in Killing of Student at Jail

snippet: A grand jury has indicted three people in the death of a 21-year-old college student whose body was found in restraints at a county jail in Savannah, Ga.
